content.rendered:
With so many thrilling activities the Colorado Rocky Mountains have to offer, it can be difficult to narrow down your vacation bucket list to just a few adventures. For those adrenaline junkies looking to produce some real horsepower all while taking in the beautiful scenery, a Wolford Mountain RZR tour is a must. Wolford Mountain, located outside of Kremmling, CO, offers over 20,000 acres and 300 miles of trails. With a guided tour through Arkansas Valley Adventures, you and your thrill-seeking friends can access all these trails with an expert by your side.

Three-hour guided tours allow guests to test their driving skills and utilize the customized, 2-person Polaris RAZRs to their full potential. With 14-inch MSA wheels and 27-inch MotoClaw tires, these RAZRs were designed for the rugged trails of Wolford. Reaching speeds of 70 mph and producing over 80 horsepower one would assume experience is necessary, however, this is not the case. With automatic transmission, power steering, 4-wheel drive, and sturdy suspension, these machines are beginner friendly. All you'll need are secure shoes, sunglasses, gloves, and clothes ready to get muddy. Helmets, goggles, and orientation to the machines will all be provided. Keep in mind you must be at least 18 years old and have a valid driver’s license to drive. Kids 12 and over are also welcome as passengers as long as they are tall enough to sit with their back all the way against the seat. Trips are currently available at 9:00am, 1:00pm and 6:00pm (great for twilight wildlife viewing) daily.

For more information on how to book your Kremmling RAZR tour or any other Colorado Rocky Mountain activity, call an agent at Arkansas Valley Adventures by dialing 877-RAFTING.
